LOGDNA_API_KEY.description: If set, enables application logging to the LogDNA logger service.

DISCORD_LOG_CHANNEL.description: The unique ID for the channel the bot will output logs to.

DISCORD_LOGIN_TOKEN.description: The login token of the bot.

CANARY_WEBHOOK_URL.description: The URL for the webhook to trigger canary builds.

DATA_CUSTOM_RESPONSES.description: Whether or not to load responses.js from the data directory.
